body_html:
As a sanity check: I repeated the cases above by rotating through each of the three states of the code and reproduced the behaviors I described above: 1) original code, running on GPU fails, 2) adding tf.device('/cpu:0') runs successfully, 3) soft placement fails with the different exception.

Thanks for the help!
